I developed an optical microphone design over a year ago. Last night I tried it for the first time using the FM radio sweep. The optical microphone uses an oil lamp flame and a phototransistor, a very simple design. I had asked for some names in this session. Here are two clips from the session.

"Poncho and Cisco"  I remember the TV show 'Cisco Kid' from 50 plus years ago.
"Jorgesen liked a beer" (or liked it here)

Dave
